question1: 1.1. Is there potential for confounding of the effect of intervention in this study?
question2: 1.2. Was the analysis based on splitting participants' follow-up time according to intervention received?
question3: 1.3. Were intervention discontinuations or switches likely to be related to factors that are prognostic for the outcome?
question4: 1.4 Did the authors use an appropriate analysis method that controlled for all the important confounding domains?
question5: 1.5 Were confounding domains that were controlled for measured validly and reliably by the variables available in this study?
